Name: ValiDate: Struggling Singles in your Area
About the game: ValiDate is a visual novel about thirteen struggling singles navigating through soul-sucking 9-to-5s, quarter-life crises, and the harsh truths millennials learn as soon as they hit their 20â€™s. Set in the Jercy City area, our cast of lovers trudge through the dregs of capitalism - a journey, a transition - a rite-of-passage that leads into uncertain mid-adulthood. In one side but not yet out on the other, 13 playable characters find romance amongst cosplay, trash mixtapes, and even poetry straight from the soul. With over 30 routes to choose from and hours of content, the lives of these singles are in your good (or bad!) decision-making hands. 4 playable characters with 30+ routes (the remaining 9 playable characters will be in future volumes). The ability to choose horrible decisions and see the entertaining fallout. #OwnVoices narrative writing by an all people of color team. A beautiful array of artists of color's work to give each character their own individual feeling. Flawed characters undergoing narrative arcs handled with empathy and self-indulgence. Achievements for every single ending.
